title: Zariel Tiefling
content:
Zariel Tiefling Racial Features Base Racial Speed Darkvision (12m) Hellish Resistance Subrace Traits Legacy of Avernus

Base Racial Speed Darkvision (12m) Hellish Resistance

Legacy of Avernus

Zariel Tiefling is a Subrace of Tiefling in Baldur's Gate 3. Zariel Tiefling have Darkvision and Hellish Resistance as racial bonuses. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have
